description:
This market will resolve to the team that officially announces Kevin Stefanski has joined it in any professional coaching or football operations role (including, but not limited to, head coach, assistant coach, or senior football staff) by April 23, 2026, at 11:59 PM ET.

If Kevin Stefanski joins a professional team not listed as an option, this market will resolve to “Other”.

If Kevin Stefanski does not officially join any listed team by April 23, 2026, at 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to “Other”.

If Kevin Stefanski announces his official retirement or that he is joining a non-professional team by that time, this market will immediately resolve to “Other”.

Temporary roles, interim titles, or short-term appointments do count, provided they are officially announced as such.

The resolution source is a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Kevin Stefanski next team?

question: Will Kevin Stefanski join the Atlanta Falcons prior to April 23, 2026?
